item.title: Creamy Chicken and Broccoli Casserole: Managing Fat Emulsification and Vegetable Texture
item.description: A guide to assembling and baking a creamy chicken and broccoli casserole that maintains proper texture balance between tender chicken, bright broccoli, and smooth cream sauce. Learn how cream cheese emulsifies fat, why broccoli texture matters, and how to build layers of flavor in a simple one-dish meal.
